trans-unit.source: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control enable users to page through data.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et felt som viser Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> kontrollen at brukere skal kunne Bla gjennom dataene.

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NextPreviousPagerField representerer et felt som viser Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Disse Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises kan brukes til å bla gjennom dataene som vises av en kontroll som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>grensesnitt som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NextPreviousPagerField inneholder knapper som gjør det mulig for brukere å gå gjennom sider i data én side om gangen, eller hoppe til den første eller siste siden i data.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the NextPreviousPagerField object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property to set the style of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse utseendet til NextPreviousPagerField-objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>til å angi stilen på knappene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property to choose the type of button that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>til å velge knappen som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelig for typene.

trans-unit.source: |Button type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| You can hide a NextPreviousPagerField object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: | Knappen typen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En kontroll som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>-kontroll. | Du kan skjule et NextPreviousPagerField objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også skjule knapper (knappene første side, forrige side, neste side og siste sider) ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>egenskapene som skal `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NextPreviousPagerField control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: NextPreviousPagerField-kontroll lar deg angi egendefinert tekst for hver knapp ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, må du oppgi URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set images individually for each button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi bilder individuelt for hver knapp ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, tilsvarende text-egenskapen fungerer som den alternative teksten for bildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A> property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel tekst som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>egenskapen skal vises som alternativ tekst for bildeknappen første side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Nettlesere som støtter verktøytips, denne tekst også vises som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPreviousPagerField constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren NextPreviousPagerField til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt dynamisk opprettet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object dynamically to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt dynamisk til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>styre, oppretter du en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til samlingen felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjennomgripende stil arket (CSS) klassen som brukes til å gjengi knappene personsøker-feltet i nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonCssClass property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ButtonCssClass-egenskapen til å angi CSS-klassen for å gjengi i nettleseren for knappene på personsøker-feltet.

trans-unit.source: This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen blir alltid gjengitt som klasseattributtet uavhengig av nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the ButtonCssClass property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Nettlesere som ikke støtter CSS, angivelse av ButtonCssClass-egenskapen har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.
trans-unit.target: CSS-klassen som brukes til å gjengi knappene i feltet personsøker på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the ButtonCssClass property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng som indikerer at ButtonCssClass-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir knappen som vises i feltet personsøker.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ButtonType som angir hvilken type knapp skal vises i et felt for knappen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available button types.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelig for typene.

trans-unit.source: |Button type value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.| When ButtonType is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: | Knappen typeverdi | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En kontroll som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>-kontroll. | Når ButtonType er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, må du angi bildet som skal vises for knappene på ved hjelp av egenskapene som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| The value of the ButtonType property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises på første side-knapp. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for forrige side. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for knappen Neste side. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for siste side-knappen. | Verdien for egenskapen ButtonType lagres i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.LastPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.NextPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.PreviousPageImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.FirstPageImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_ButtonType.Link" name="ButtonType.Link" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the ButtonType property is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ButtonType er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties-metoden er en helper.

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>objekt som er sendt av `newField` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField"> </xref> å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> til.

trans-unit.source: Creates the user interface (UI) controls for the pager field object and adds them to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter brukeren brukergrensesnittet (UI) kontroller for personsøker field-objektet og legger dem til den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataPagers method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the UI controls for the pager field, such as the Previous and Next buttons.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataPagers brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette Brukergrensesnittet kontrollerer for feltet personsøker, for eksempel knappene forrige og neste.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.CreatePagerFields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the controls.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen som brukes til å lagre kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on the page.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første posten på siden.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items on a single page.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall elementer på én side.

trans-unit.source: The total number of items.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall elementer.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data pager field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for personsøker datafelt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields*>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>-metoden til basisklassen til å opprette en tom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Equals method to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object is equal to the object that is specified by the `o` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Bruk er lik-metoden til å fastslå om gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet som er lik objektet som er angitt av den `o` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: Equals returns `true` if the two objects contain exactly the same values for all public properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> class.
trans-unit.target: Er lik returnerer `true` hvis de to objektene inneholder nøyaktig de samme verdiene for alle offentlige egenskaper for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objekt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for første side-knappen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen FirstPageImageUrl til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som vises på første side-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP og så videre) som støttes i nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the FirstPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn `ButtonType.Image`, angir egenskapen FirstPageImageUrl har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for første side-knappen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the FirstPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at FirstPageImageUrl-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for første side-knappen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the FirstPageText property to specify the text to display for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen FirstPageText til å angi teksten som skal vises på første side-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowFirstPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the FirstPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, vises bildet og egenskapen FirstPageText fungerer som den alternative teksten for bildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Denne teksten vises på lesere som støtter verktøytips, også som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen, og den kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for første side-knappen.

trans-unit.source: The default is "First".
trans-unit.target: Standarden er "Først".

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som en hash-funksjonen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Handles events that occur in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> control and performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Behandler hendelser som forekomme i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> kontrollere og utfører de nødvendige handlingene.

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HandleEvent er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called to handle events that occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Kalles for å behandle hendelser som forekommer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt når en av knappene i kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The HandleEvent method examines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HandleEvent undersøker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>objektet som ligger i den `e` parameteren og utfører de nødvendige handlingene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser knappene som tilbys av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>kontrollen og handlingen som utføres når knappen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |First page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the first page of data.| |Previous page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the previous page of data.| |Next page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the next page of data.| |Last page|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>|Navigates to the last page of data.|
trans-unit.target: | Knappen | Verdien for kommandonavn | Handlingen | |------------|-----------------------|------------| | Første side | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| Går til den første siden i data. | | Forrige side | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| Går til forrige side i data. | | Neste side | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| Går til neste side i data. | | Siden siste | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>| Navigerer til den siste siden i data. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.LastPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.NextPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.PreviousPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands.FirstPageCommandArgument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises på siste side-knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the LastPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen LastPageImageUrl til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for siste side-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP og så videre) som støttes i nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the LastPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn `ButtonType.Image`, angir egenskapen LastPageImageUrl har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the last-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som vises på siste side-knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the LastPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at LastPageImageUrl-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the last-page button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for siste side-knappen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the LastPageText property to specify the text to display for the last-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen LastPageText til å angi teksten som skal vises for siste side-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowLastPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the LastPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, vises bildet og egenskapen LastPageText fungerer som den alternative teksten for bildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen NextPageImageUrl til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for knappen Neste side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP og så videre) som støttes i nettleseren.

trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn `ButtonType.Image`, angir egenskapen NextPageImageUrl har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som vises på neste side-knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen NextPageText til å angi teksten som skal vises for knappen Neste side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowNextPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the NextPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, vises bildet og egenskapen NextPageText fungerer som den alternative teksten for bildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for knappen Neste side.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Next".
trans-unit.target: Som standard brukes "Nei".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for forrige side-knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the PreviousPageImageUrl property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen PreviousPageImageUrl til å angi URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for forrige side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP og så videre) som støttes i nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the PreviousPageImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn `ButtonType.Image`, angir egenskapen PreviousPageImageUrl har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som vises for forrige side-knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the PreviousPageImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at PreviousPageImageUrl-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for forrige side.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A> property is set to `true`, use the PreviousPageText property to specify the text to display for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>er satt til `true`, bruke egenskapen PreviousPageText til å angi teksten som skal vises for forrige side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ShowPreviousPageButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the PreviousPageText property acts as the alternate text for the image.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, vises bildet og egenskapen PreviousPageText fungerer som den alternative teksten for bildet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Denne teksten vises på lesere som støtter verktøytips, også som et verktøytips.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for forrige side.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Previous".
trans-unit.target: Standarden er "Forrige".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om deaktivert knappene gjengis som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"> </xref> kontrollerer av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels-egenskapen til å angi om deaktivert knappene gjengis som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>kontrollerer av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The buttons are disabled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Knappene er deaktivert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt når funksjonen tilknyttet knappen ikke kan utføres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled.
trans-unit.target: Når du er i den første siden i data, deaktiveres for eksempel knappene på første side og forrige side.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet gjengir knappene deaktivert ved hjelp av kontrolltypen angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: It also sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> property of the control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Det angir også de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>kontrollen til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to render the disabled buttons.
trans-unit.target: Når RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objekt bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>kontrollen skal gjengi knappene deaktivert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A> property is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>egenskapen brukes til å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.ButtonCssClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if disabled buttons are rendered as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis deaktivert knappene gjengis som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label"> </xref> kontrollerer; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om gjengis hardt mellomrom mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls-egenskapen til å angi om hardt mellomrom (HTML ` ` tegn) gjengis mellom Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: You can set RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls til `false` Hvis du trenger mer kontroll over oppsettet du oppretter med gjennomgripende stil arket (CSS) klasser.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjengis hardt mellomrom mellom kontroller. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som viser om på første side-knappen som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowFirstPageButton property to show or hide the first-page button of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowFirstPageButton-egenskapen for å vise eller skjule knappen første side av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: To show the first-page button, set the ShowFirstPageButton property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise på første side-knappen, angi ShowFirstPageButton egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den første side-knappen vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objekt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the last-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som viser om siste side-knappen som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowLastPageButton property to show or hide the last-page button of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowLastPageButton-egenskapen for å vise eller skjule knappen siste side av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField>

trans-unit.source: To show the last-page button, set the ShowLastPageButton property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise siste side-knappen, angi ShowLastPageButton egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the last-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the next-page button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som viser om neste side-knappen som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowNextPageButton property to show or hide the next-page button of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in viewstate.
